Robot Soccer Kit
GitHub repository

Documentation

The goal of this project is to provide an open-source material to build and operate a setup featuring omniwheel robots and a soccer field monitoring them with a camera. With this setup, it is possible for two teams to code a program and play against each other.
This is a WORK IN PROGRESS, you can't (yet) build the whole setup by following instructions from this documentation, if any question, do not hesitate to open an issue
  • Robots
  • Coordinates, field and markers
  • Game Controller and Python API

GitHub repository

https://github.com/robot-soccer-kit/robot-soccer-kit
